title: WTB or WTT for EVERS PORTRAIT

posts.post_title: WTB or WTT for EVERS PORTRAIT
posts.post_content:
Need Evers Portrait will pay upto 600.00 for a nice one. If it is a 2 -3, a crease is okay if not in the face. More concerned with having nice boarders. Anything equally rounded is trimmed to me no matter if graded or not.

Thanks
Dan Koteles
